entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local smoke this afternoon. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
